channel.title: Soulcatcher rework
channel.description:
I know that the priest is convert immune now. Thing is that might be temporary. If the reason for the change had to do with the Soulcatcher than that is what needs changing.
Soulcatcher - Unseen Social Passives: Consume soul - like it was before. Consume 2 souls to heal Call the darkness - The dead can talk to the living unseen. The dead will hear you as Priest
Night Ability's: Capture soul - If your target dies you will gain thier soul (unlimited) Absorb souls - You lose all of your souls. All whispers to and from the players who's souls you captured are revealed to you.
Any suggestions? Please don't bring up how likely Soulcatcher is to be brought back, there are other threads for that.

item.title: Soulcatcher rework
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Btw I changed the talk to the dead slightly

Read full topic

item.title: Soulcatcher rework
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Don’t forget that you read whispers RETROACTIVELY. Meaning that if someone was being whispered to a lot earlier in the game and you collect thier soul then you would know what that whisper was even though you weren’t even soul catcher at the time.

Read full topic

item.title: Soulcatcher rework
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Seems incredibly weak apart from the talking one which is still weak because it’s an Apostle but you only get one

Read full topic

item.title: Soulcatcher rework

item.description:
I know that the priest is convert immune now. Thing is that might be temporary. If the reason for the change had to do with the Soulcatcher than that is what needs changing.

Soulcatcher - Unseen Social
Passives:
Consume soul - like it was before. Consume 2 souls to heal
Call the darkness - The dead can talk to the living unseen. The dead will hear you as Priest

Night Ability’s:
Capture soul - If your target dies you will gain thier soul (unlimited)
Absorb souls - You lose all of your souls. All whispers to and from the players who’s souls you captured are revealed to you.

Any suggestions? Please don’t bring up how likely Soulcatcher is to be brought back, there are other threads for that.
